p: It could be concluded that E. grandiflorum contained a wide range of phytochemical constituents, their significant in vitro and in vivo antioxidant potential, significant hepatoprotective, renoprotective and reproductive hormones restoring capacity in male albino rats as therapeutic response directly proportional to doses of hydroethanolic extract administered. However, more research is required to isolate the novel compounds from this therapeutic plant to address the problems particularly of impotency.
